channel.title: CVE Feed for vaadin -- vaadin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for vaadin -- vaadin

item.title: CVE-2023-25500|2023-06-22T13:14:15.174Z -- vaadin -- vaadin
item.description: Possible information disclosure in Vaadin 10.0.0 to 10.0.23, 11.0.0 to 14.10.1, 15.0.0 to 22.0.28, 23.0.0 to 23.3.13, 24.0.0 to 24.0.6, 24.1.0.alpha1 to 24.1.0.rc2, resulting in potential information disclosure of class and method names in RPC responses by sending modified requests.
